title: Love You Always
description: Sal and Luke’s love story continues in this suspenseful new novella in the Nashville Star series.Sal Kincaid has been to hell and back—and survived.Now, her life is where it’s always meant to be. With Luke, her country superstar husband by her side, her career as a paramedic taking off, and an exciting secret she’s keeping close to her heart, Sal’s future has never been brighter.But when tragedy strikes, Sal is left fighting for her life and everything in it— including her and Luke’s perfect second chance. And Luke will do whatever it takes to find his wife before it’s too late.Before he loses the one person he can’t live without.Love You Always is book 2.5 in the Nashville Star Series. It’s a novella (35,000 words) that ends in an HEA. It’s best enjoyed as a continuation of Book One—Sing You Home. There are trigger warnings for references to abuse and pregnancy loss.
author: Ava  Hunter
